about.title: About
about.passion: - a tech lead who found his passion in
about.passion2: turning outdated systems into modern, scalable solutions.
about.description: My coding journey started with self-taught experiments, but quickly evolved into something bigger than I imagined.
about.technologies: These days, I orchestrate a mix of {react}, {nodejs}, and {cloud} to build
about.technologies2: systems that actually make a difference.
about.achievement3: , where we turned a basic internal tool into a robust banking platform
about.impact2: . Nothing beats the feeling of seeing your code making
about.personal: I'm that developer who gets excited about both
about.devops: DevOps? Count me in! I love the whole puzzle of making applications not just work, but thrive at scale.
about.teaching: When I'm not deep in code, you might find me sharing knowledge with aspiring developers -
about.teaching3: reminds me why I fell in love with programming in the first place.
about.teaching4: Always up for learning something new or tackling an interesting challenge!

description.1: Led a cross-functional team of 4 developers while maintaining hands-on development responsibilities.
description.2: Spearheaded the implementation of robust banking integrations and independently maintained the mobile application.
description.3: Orchestrated daily operations including sprint planning, code reviews, and technical decision-making while collaborating with CTO on strategic initiatives.

keyContributions.1: Managed team efficiency through ClickUp implementation and agile ceremonies
keyContributions.2: Architected and implemented secure banking integration systems
keyContributions.3: Developed, launched and maintained mobile application

description.1: Spearheaded the complete redesign and modernization of the company's core platform, transforming a proof-of-concept MVP into a scalable SaaS solution.
description.2: Led the successful migration of existing customers while implementing modern development practices and infrastructure improvements.

keyContributions.1: Rebuilt core platform features with focus on maintainability and scalability
keyContributions.2: Scaled system capacity from 100 to 500+ users with zero downtime
keyContributions.3: Implemented CI/CD pipelines to ensure reliable deployments
keyContributions.4: Successfully transformed internal platform into a customer-facing SaaS product

description.1: Led development and maintenance of multiple interconnected systems including backoffice platform, customer-facing portal, and mobile application for property management.
description.2: Mentored 30 interns while managing critical product features and customer-centric solutions.

keyContributions.1: Led development of property management features including space scheduling, document management, and notification systems
keyContributions.2: Managed parallel development of web platforms and mobile application
keyContributions.3: Structured and delivered technical training program with 97% success rate
keyContributions.4: Developed customer-focused problem-solving approach, prioritizing end-user value in technical decisions
keyContributions.5: Created curriculum based on industry-standard resources like FreeCodeCamp, MDN, roadmap.sh
keyContributions.6: Led interns through full-stack development journey from programming basics to complete CRUD applications using PHP and JavaScript

description.1: Played a key role in the innovation sector, developing new-generation legal and property management solutions.
description.2: Led development of a LGPD-compliant legal system with focus on security and data protection.
description.3: Expanded technical expertise into mobile development while building a comprehensive property management solution.

keyContributions.1: Developed a comprehensive property management system
keyContributions.2: Spearheaded development of a secure legal system
keyContributions.3: Architected and launched a secure legal system MVP with advanced encryption and hashing

description.1: Contributed to maintaining and enhancing a comprehensive 15-year-old intranet system serving critical business functions.
description.2: Gained extensive experience working across various modules of a mature enterprise system.

keyContributions.1: Maintained and enhanced multiple system modules from employee communication to customer reporting
keyContributions.2: Developed solutions for both internal operations and customer-facing reporting
keyContributions.3: Collaborated within a small, high-performance team on business-critical applications
keyContributions.4: Rapidly acquired proficiency in legacy system maintenance and enhancement
